text:
We're in Northern Italy in Cinque Terre and
we're about to do the 5 Villages walk.

It takes about 5 hours and we're going to
be going 11 km along the beautiful Mediterranean Coast
There's the trail!
The path takes you through lovely villages

Now this is the life, cappuccino on the Cinque
Terre in Italy.
A little excitement.
We're here in the town of Manarola Italy

We are now in Corniglia, and we are at a nice
little square overlooking the Mediterranean

we just walked up a bunch of steps, so it's
reward time, we are going to look for a place

to eat.
We'll have some lunch in beautiful Italy.

We're walking along the final trail of the
day and we are amongst lavender, and all kinds

of aromatherapy, and essential oils, there's
olive fields, there's vineyards, and we also
have some lemon trees.

It's a beautiful walk this is a far more rugged
terrain and a lot more fun
The day's gorgeous, let's keep on going
We have arrived in Vernazza and gelato awaits.

And here is our reward for a long day on the
trail
Pimenta, yogurt with straberries, and fondante,
Excellent reward
